wikipedia_page.main: Gareth Owen (born 1984) is a Welsh TV Presenter best known for co-hosting flagship youth Magazine show Uned 5 between 2002–2005 with Gethin Jones and Lisa Gwilym.After his three-year stint on Uned 5, he became a regular face for S4C's coverage of major Welsh festivals such as the Urdd Eisteddfod and the National Eisteddfod, and currently fronts Cor Cymru (a high-profile search for the best choir in Wales) for the channel every 2 years.

response: *Lisa Gwilym, Gareth Owen and Gethin Jones
File:Uned 5 line-up.jpg|The presenting line-up in 2004: Lisa Gwilym, Gareth Owen and Gethin Jones

Côr Cymru is a Welsh TV competition searching for the best choir in Wales, which airs every 2 years on S4C. The first series was presented by Aled Jones and Heledd Cynwal in 2003, but subsequent series have been fronted by Nia Roberts and Gareth Owen.
*Gareth Owen (footballer, born 1971), Welsh football player and manager
*Gareth Owen (rugby union) (born 1988), Welsh rugby union player
*Gareth Owen (English rugby league) (born 1992), English rugby league footballer
*Gareth Owen (Welsh rugby league), rugby league footballer of the 1980s for Wales and Oldham
*Gareth Owen (sound designer) (born 1977), British theatrical sound designer
*Gareth Owen (writer), Birmingham writer and poet see Birmingham Arts Lab
